name: Mega Man-Boss Rush
description:
★★★★★★★INSTRUCTIONS★★★★★★★

- Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump

- Space to charge and fire your blaster and select boss

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Fight in epic battles against the Robot Masters from Mega Man II. Defeating all of them will allow you to fight one of the evil Dr. Wily's biggest creations.

Robot Masters from Easiest to Hardest:
- Wood Man
- Air Man
- Flash Man
- Metal Man
- Bubble Man
- Heat Man
- Crash Man
- Quick Man
